Research_direction: 动物生态学与生物多样性，保护生物学   1.湿地鸟类多样性及其形成和维持机制   2.非法狩猎的多维度驱动因素   3.机场鸟击预警防范   教育背景：   2010.04—2016.01荷兰瓦赫宁根大学资源生态学系Ph.D.   2007.09—2009.12中国科学技术大学生命科学学院M.Sc.   2003.09—2007.07陕西师范大学生命科学学院B.Sc.   学术兼职:   IUCN Species Survival Commission成员(2013–至今)   WI-IUCN SSC Goose Specialist Group成员(2013–至今)   PLOSOne编委
Paper:
近期代表性论文
1. Chen, Sheng, Zhang, Yong*, Xu, Chi, et al. 2022. Neighbourhood threats: landscape context and anthropogenic changes can trigger waterbird population collapse. Landscape Ecology, https://doi.org/10.1007/s10980-022-01518-5.
2. Chen, Sheng, Zhang, Yong*, Borzee, Amael, et al. 2021. Landscape attributes best explain the population trend of wintering greater white-fronted goose (Anser albifrons) in the Yangtze River Floodplain.Land, 10(8),865.
3. Zhang, Yong*, Fox, Anthony D, Cao, Lei, et al. 2019. Effects of ecological and anthropogenic factors on waterbird abundance at a Ramsar Site in the Yangtze River Floodplain. Ambio, 48(3),293-303.
4. Chen, Yan, Zhang, Yong*, Cao, Lei*, et al. 2019. Wintering Swan Geese maximize energy intake through substrate foraging depth when feeding on buried Vallisnerianatans tubers. Avian Research,10(1),1-8.
5. Li, Chunlin, Zhang, Yong, Zha, Daode, et al. 2019. Assembly processes of waterbird communities across subsidence wetlands in China: A functional and phylogenetic approach. Diversity and Distributions, 25(7),1118-1129.
